ingredients: 2 carrots, peeled, cut into large pieces
1/2 large cauliflower, cut into large pieces
2 medium russet potatoes, peeled, cut into 4 pieces
1 large Italian Eggplant, peeled, cut into large pieces
1/2 large white onion, finely chopped + some for garnish
fresh jalapeno, finely chopped + some for garnish (amount depends on your preferred level of spice)
1/4 bunch fresh cilantro, finely chopped + some for garnish
sourdough bread slices (or gluten-free bread, french buns, burger buns, whole wheat bread, etc.)
